original_body_lines: A lawyer representing former Attorney General Dappula de Livera appeared before the Terrorist Investigation Division (TID) today.
De Livera was summoned to the TID to record a statement over a comment he had made on the 2019 Easter Sunday bomb attacks.
Attorney-at-law Dimitra Abeysekara said a seven-page legal objection was submitted to the TID on behalf of Dappula de Livera.
